name: CBRE Group, Inc.
summary: CBRE Group, Inc. is the world's largest commercial real estate services and investment firm, headquartered in Dallas, Texas, with a global financial headquarters in New York City. Founded in 1906, CBRE offers a broad range of services including facilities management, project management, property sales and leasing, investment management, and capital markets services. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker CBRE and is ranked 135th on the Fortune 500 list.
